exclusion.criterion: Patients who had undergone medical and surgical treatment for lower urinary tract symptoms
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with neurological diseases (Parkinson's, Multiple Sclerosis etc ...)
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with indication for surgical treatment at the time of initial admission
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Macroscopic hematuria, bladder stone, urinary retention, upper urinary tract dilatation
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of CVA and neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter. He has had multiple prior admissions for UTIs and presents now in urosepsis, which is resolved after treatment.
